verses.roman:
caitanya-caritra--yena amṛtera pūra
śunite śravaṇe mane lāgaye madhura

synonyms: caitanya-caritra—the character of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yena—as if; amṛtera pūra—filled with nectar; śunite—hearing; śravaṇe—to the ear; mane—to the mind; lāgaye—feels; madhura—pleasing.
translation: The character of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu is full of nectar. Hearing about it is pleasing to the ear and mind.
